snippet.title: PokeOne: Mobile Client for Smartphones and Tablets Introduction - App
snippet.description:
In this video we want to introduce you to the new mobile version for Android. We'll go into some of the features and introduce you to the client. 

The Android Version is now Live: u can Download the APK Here: https://pokeonecommunity.com/index.php?mod=files&action=view&id=20

Android Requirements
- Android 7.0 or above to run 
- A good amount of free space, (some users can not install the game unless they have like 8gb or so free for some reason), however the game is about 1.6gb in size..
- at least 1gb free ram
- a reasonably modern top tier phone.. but you can see a list of working devices here, which you should be able to add to
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1XyttoLlTaBsvLwre7DFH2ORmQaHfJYyA7RrIXY5pAMY/edit#gid=0

Voice Over: Peak
